message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  What would you say to an investment of $14,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $12,000. Let me know if this is something we can work with.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am unable to go beyond $12,500 for this product. Let me know if this is a feasible offer for you.
